title: Endings Guide
content:
Upon arriving at the foot of the Netherbrain, your goal is to reach the top of it with your party. In this area, you will be battling thralls, the Netherbrain's spawns in an attempt to slow your party. Once you are successful at this battle, the Netherbrain is weakened and will try to tempt The Emperor by offering him a choice to join and be The Absolute. This will then prompt a choice for your character who might see this as an opportunity:
